attributes.action: introduce day ticket road tax and possibly include 3rd party insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The technlogy now exists to provide pay as you use motor taxation.Buying 1,2, x day's tax on-line could be simply provided. Why should we pay for time that a vehicle is not in use? A 4x4 would be an asset to my farm work. I wouldn't use my tractor for livestock haulage. I can't afford to tax & insure a 4x4 for the few occasions that I really need it.
The time for pay as you use technology has arrived. Forced taxation for unused time is dishonest and should be viewed in the same light as excess bank charges.
